mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM ( NO , MEMBER_NO , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN , MODIFY_DATE , HIT , PICK_YN , HASHTAG ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMM_NO.NEXTVAL , '7' , #{category} , #{title} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' , SYSDATE , 0 , 'N' , #{hashtag} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.NO , M.NICK , CC.NAME , C.TITLE , C.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.DELETE_YN , C.MODIFY_DATE , C.HIT , C.REPORT_YN , M.NICK , M.GRADE_NO FROM COMM C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN COMM_CATE CC ON C.CATEGORY = CC.NO WHERE C.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND C.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' AND CC.NO = '1' ORDER BY C.NO DESC

SELECT C.NO , M.NICK , CC.NAME , C.TITLE , C.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.DELETE_YN , C.MODIFY_DATE , C.HIT , C.REPORT_YN , M.NICK , M.GRADE_NO FROM COMM C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN COMM_CATE CC ON C.CATEGORY = CC.NO WHERE C.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND C.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' AND CC.NO = '2' ORDER BY C.NO DESC

SELECT C.NO , M.NICK , CC.NAME , C.TITLE , C.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.DELETE_YN , C.MODIFY_DATE , C.HIT , C.REPORT_YN , M.NICK , M.GRADE_NO FROM COMM C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN COMM_CATE CC ON C.CATEGORY = CC.NO WHERE C.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND C.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' AND CC.NO = '3' ORDER BY C.NO DESC

SELECT C.NO , M.NICK , CC.NAME , C.TITLE , C.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.DELETE_YN , C.MODIFY_DATE , C.HIT , C.PICK_YN , C.REPORT_YN , M.GRADE_NO FROM COMM C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN COMM_CATE CC ON C.CATEGORY = CC.NO WHERE C.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY C.NO DESC

SELECT CC.CMT_NO, CC.POST_NO, CCA.NAME, C.TITLE, CC.CMT, TO_CHAR(CC.MODIFY_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE FROM COMM_CMT CC JOIN COMM C ON C.NO = CC.POST_NO JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CCA.NO = C.CATEGORY WHERE WRITER = #{no} ORDER BY MODIFY_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM WHERE CATEGORY = '2' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM WHERE CATEGORY = '3' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
